During our meeting today, we decided to launch a platform for 339 UAE government leaders involved in policy formulation in the UAE to consult, train and share experiences
During our meeting, we also adopted a project for the establishment of the State's strategic medical inventory, establishing health security and preparing for any exceptional circumstances
We have also adopted an integrated project to promote public health through strong measures in the prevention of communicable diseases and epidemics

We adopted a resolution encouraging the Gulf nationals to acquire health and pharmaceutical facilities, in order to encourage investment in this sector and to establish equality with the national businessmen
We also adopted the UAE's accession to the Optional Protocol to the Convention on the Rights of the Child on the exploitation of children and the protection of all their rights
